news_header: Investigator Charly Salonius-Pasternak suggests that J.D. Vance's recent comments on Ukraine may not reflect a tactical approach but rather highlight the chaos within the Trump administration.
news_original_title: USA:n varapresidentti Vancen puheilla Venäjän painostamisesta ei ole mitään arvoa, sanoo tutkija
news_text: Vance indicated potential military and economic pressure on Russia if peace negotiations fail, contrasting with Trump's discussions with Putin. Salonius-Pasternak doubts the credibility of Vance's statements, suggesting they may have been influenced by the White House. Vance's participation in the Munich Security Conference is expected to further clarify the Trump administration's Ukraine policy.
